title: Not Enough IP
body: So, I'm trying to buy Jayce {{champion:126}}  (don't judge), and I have 5007 IP, but when I try to buy him, or any other 4800 IP champion, it won't let me and says that I don't have enough RP/IP. However, when I go to buy a 3150 champion (or anything cheaper), it gives me the option to purchase it with IP. I've tried resetting my client several times, played a few games to get more IP, and have waited for 9 hours, and still nothing, please help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you're still experiencing this issue, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support.

We here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
The same kind of thing is happening to me right now
